page.title: 06HISTORY OF BALLOCHYLE.
page.content: Years ago {Ballochyle Estate}was owned by the {Campbell }family. One of the owners names was {William Rose {Campbell. }In his time in Ballochyle there were very few animals. The largest number of animals was {16 {sheep}. Now there are {2500 sheep,}20 cattle, 3 horses, 2 dogs and 2 goats. A story about Ballochyle is that the {Ballochyle Brooch}(still on Ballochyle Estate) was a cure for many illnesses. If someone in the house was sick they were put in a tub of water with the brooch and it was believed that it cured them. People came from miles away to try this cure. In the middle of the brooch is a rock crystal charm stone which is said to work wonders. Another fact is there have been {two {Ballochyle Houses. }The old one was burnt down by Atholmen many years ago.
